name: Trash God
description:
TRASH GOD

Hi Hello! This is a small environment project.
Get through the alleyway and read some notes along the way.

Become Trash God ...

CONTROLS:
WASD to move
Mouse to Look
Left Mouse Button to click
ESC to menu

Music by McKenzie Hoagland

I Used Ben Esposito's FP Drifter - http://www.torahhorse.com/index.php/portfolio/first-person-drifter-for-unity/
